title: Drawing, early 20th century
medium: Brush and green watercolor (gouache?) on off-white coated wove paper
inscribed: On verso, inscribed in graphite, lower left: 1165 [above] 1632(3) [with horizontal line between them]
description: Wiener Werkstatte (Vienna Workshop) design for decorated paper: green, undulating zigzag pattern, placed diagonally on sheet.  Image made by "combed" technique or fingerpainted.
